modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod gives you more containers to be needed to lock pick. You can have both lock picking additions and open door syndrome.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod gives you more containers to be needed to lock pick. Some containers/chests/cabinets etc. are unlocked whilst others you come across will be locked and require you to lock pick them.

You can have both lock picking additions and [Open Door Syndrome](https://7daystodiemods.com/open-door-syndrome/). But don’t use lock picking additions with [Open Door Syndrome With Respawn and Lock Picking Additions](https://7daystodiemods.com/open-door-syndrome-with-respawn/) as it is not compatible.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/Stallionsdens%20Lock%20Picking%20Additions)**

If you appreciate Stallionsden’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](http://paypal.me/AnthonyCar78).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19911-stallionsdens-and-valmars-a19-mod-thread/).

**Credits:** [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/)
